Direct Admission In BANGALORE

E

What is Direct Admission?

Like you would guess, direct admission is a form of entrance to a college where you don't have to qualify in the entrance test.

In case you are wondering, direct admission is totally legal. Some candidates may not qualify in the entrance exams for a myriad of reasons. Despite being a good student, you may simply not perform well in the entrance test. But that shouldn't stop you from saving one year, right? So, you can take the direct admission route and do yourself a favour. However, you still need to fulfill the eligibility for COMEDK, which is an average score of 45% in PCM.

What is the Process of Direct Admission?

Its really simple! All you have to do is contact us with your preference of college. We will do the magic for you

Once you select your preference, we will update you with all the terms specific to that particular college. Relax! We wil NOT ask you for any advance payment. Some colleges may provision spot admission. You just have to bring a demand draft(In college name) for a portion of tuition fees. Once you have the admission letter, we will ask you for a small service fee, agreed upon in advance. Process remains same for colleges which do not offer spot admission, just you will be informed when the college is ready. If you wish to proceed, all you need to do is sit back and relax.

Which is the Best College in Bangalore?

Really? If you found us, you probably know the best college!

Most of the colleges in Bangalore are affiliated to VTU. So the underlying course structure remains the same. That said, you can still achieve the same success paradigm as long as you perform well in any college you join. Some colleges are deemed to be Universities themselves, known as autonomous colleges. Some of the factors that differentiate them may be location, quality of staff, placements, infrastructure etc. Contact us for a detailed overview based on your preference.
